GeochemXYDiagram.name: QZ vs FS Diagram
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Competing phases quartz and feldspar, quartz control line is horizontal, Anorthite is vertical
Albite, K feldspar, and muscovite will drive data parallel to the respective control lines marked with Ab/KF, and Mu
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Theoretical basis for PER diagrams is described in Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
